name: Quest Giver (Zalinius, Nicole Parmentier)
description:
Welcome to your new job NPC, your task is to give out quests to the heroes of your town. Pair up heroes with quests each day in new contracts. Give them quests which are appropriate to their level to help them become mighty, and perhaps some day one of your clients will become the hero of the town. Try not to get yourself fired or killed, and do your best not to destroy the entire world.

Can you get all 4 endings?

  • Get fired
  • Save the world
  • The town is destroyed
  • Get assassinated

Gameboy style controls:

Arrow keys: to navigate menus

Z: Accept

X: Back
